Windlord:

"Very risky"replied Winlord"We barely could stand agains the 
minions... they retreat'cause they decided to do... but with low 
injuries"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Megatron Revived:
>  
> "There is a way to greatly deplete his Sweeps' numbers," the 
Emperor clone said.  "I have yet to test my fusion cannon at it's 
full power.  In simulation, it has the ability to turn a space 
colony to space dust.  I have many techniques and weapons that would 
allow for what we need.  But I would be a diversion.  Someone else 
would have to slip in and find Malice.  This isn't impossible, just 
extremely difficult."
> 
> Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> Her jaw dropped again.  "This
> is...very...very...unexpected.  If what you say is
> true I apologize."  She gathered up her bolts, and
> threw them again.  She saw that what they said was
> true, and almost started to cry.  She had to complete
> her mission.  She had to get back to Deus.
> 
> --- robert riley <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> > Organics:
> >  
> > "Yes, he does possess the untold legions.  We fought
> > some Sweeps and their commander earlier.  He has the
> > legions and the ability to create more.  In essence,
> > he has an unlimited supply of Sweeps to guard him."
> > the valkyrie said.
> > 
> > Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > "He's the size of a moon.  You would require untold
> > legions of bots to protect even all of the obvious
> > entrances.  And once you're inside the only unknown
> > would be 'can they get to me faster than I can open
> > the Matrix', which I think we can lean toward the
> > answer being no.  Is there something essential I'm
> > missing?  Or does he just have the aforementioned
> > 'untold legions' at his disposal, in which case we'd
> > be slag either way."
> > 
> > --- robert riley <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> > > OOC:  I don't know about you're faction, I'm not
> > on
> > > the Council.  As for going up to Unicron, it would
> > > not be very feasible.  They need to blast INTO
> > > Unicron, FIND Malice, and BLAST out and return to
> > > the planet safely.  All things they can't really
> > do
> > > right now.
> > >  
> > > IC:
> > > Megatron Revived:
> > >  
> > > "Perhaps you would like to show me an opening not
> > > guarded and a time where he is not defended.  We
> > > should wait and have him brought to us.  Much
> > > easier, and besides, they will want to show off
> > > their newest toy anyway." the clone said, drawing
> > on
> > > memory and the Matrix.  He replaced the artifact
> > > back into it's place and his chest closed.
> > > "Though I might have the raw power to blast in,
> > > there are too many unknowns to go blindly
> > forward."
> > > 
> > > Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > > "If you want to stop Unicron, why don't you just
> > > take
> > > the slagging Matrix to him, and open it like
> > Optimus
> > > Prime did?"  She had no idea why she was
> > suggesting
> > > that two such sources of Destiny energy wipe each
> > > other out, but she doubted the Decepticon would
> > have
> > > simply be oblivious to the option.
> > > 
> > > OOC: Has the council begun discussion on the
> > > Deviner's
> > > limitations, or is it just a big topic of debate
> > > 
> > > --- robert riley <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> > > > Megatron Revived:
> > > >  
> > > > "No, there is no 'divided' Matrix.  Most
> > > Decepticons
> > > > and appearently Pedacons assume leadership
> > through
> > > > force and brutality.  Just as the Autobot Matrix
> > > > allowed Optimus Prime to give life to the
> > Dinobots
> > > > and others, the Decepticon Matrix allows me to
> > do
> > > > the same.  I have spent time working with my
> > > Matrix,
> > > > and developed the ability to read any
> > Decepticon's
> > > > spark."
> > > > A series of locks unlatched and Megatron Revived
> > > > pulled the Matrix out.  The gold, ornate housing
> > > > held inside a pulsating red crystal, the actual
> > > > Matrix.  The clone held it firmly in his hands,
> > so
> > > > no one could take it, if they were dumb enough
> > to
> > > > try.
> > > > "This is THE Decepticon Matrix of Leadership."
> > > > 
> > > > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > > Windlord:
> > > > 
> > > > "Or both has adivided MAtrix"said Windlord 
> > > >

> > > > <bustercross365@y...> 
> > > > wrote:
> > > > > Megatron Revived:
> > > > >  
> > > > > The emperor clone stood, and his three part
> > > chest
> > > > panel opened.  
> > > > Another cover opens and reveals the golden
> > Matrix
> > > > housing.
> > > > > "No, I have the Matrix.  He must have a very
> > > > convincing fake."
> > > > > 
> > > > > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > > > Windlord:
> > > > > 
> > > > > "But Hydras has it.... as long as I know"said
> > > the
> > > > male

> > > > >

> > > > of Leadership." 
> > > > > the clone said.
